    • Uses of PhysicsBody in com.linesengine.physics

      Subclasses of PhysicsBody in com.linesengine.physics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoxBody
      BoxBody is a child object of PhysicsBody that simulates collision and movement for a box shaped are
      class  CircleBody
      CircleBody is a child object of PhysicsBody that simulates the movement and collisions for a circle shaped area.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks whether this CircleBody is colliding with the given PhysicsBody.

      Calculates the rotational behavior to be applied when two objects collide.
